title: RegisterToServer (Method)
text:
METHOD RegisterToServer : UDINT
Register an empty/freshly created BACnet-Client-FB with its parent BACnet-Server-FB.
If the FB was created by a device this initialization is automatically done during Initialization.
Using this function enables one to dynamically create BACnet-Client-FBs, which were not inserted via the device tree.
Return CmpErrors.Errors.ERR_OK if successful.
